name: Gaslamp Cases: The deadly Machine
description:
Morgan Johnson is one of Londons finest police detectives. As his partner dies while investigating a strange case of murder, he finds himself blamed. Demoted and removed from the case, Morgan is assigned a new partner: Jack Brown, a young officer notorious for his loose interpretation of the rules. Worst of all, for their first job together, they’re told to find a missing dog. For Morgan, things couldn’t be worse.

But when the seemingly innocuous case turns up and unusual clue, Morgan and Jack find themselves on the edge of a dark conspiracy brewing in the shadows…
A conspiracy that threatens London itself.

- Thrilling and unusual cases to solve
- Fun match-3 puzzles to test your
- Unique characters across the story
- 5 chapters and a single story connecting them all
- 20 upgrades to unlock
